title: An ouersight, and deliberacion vpon the holy prophete Ionas: made, and vttered before the kynges maiestie, and his moost honorable councell, by Ihon Hoper in lent last past. Comprehended in seue[n] sermons. Anno. M.D.L.
author: Hooper, John, d. 1555.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Ihon Daye, dwellyng ouer Aldersgate, and Wylliam Seres dwellinge in Peter Colledge] Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
